text: "Since You Been Gone" is a 1976 song by Russ Ballard and was taken from his studio album Winning. ==Rainbow version== In 1979, British band Rainbow and was taken from their fourth studio album Down to Earth. It went to number 6 in the United Kingdom, number 57 in the United States, number 5 in Ireland and number 47 in the Netherlands. ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Rainbow (rock band) songs
title: Since You Been Gone
